concept.title: API Requirements
concept.shortdesc: This topic describes the requirements for using API.

section.title: Requirements
section.p: Before using the API feature, make sure the following configurations are ready:

dlentry.dd: This documentation is based on API 2.0.0, you need to upgrade PBX firmware to the version that is applicable to API 2.0.0.
PBX version requirement: Firmware version 81.13.0.30 or later.
PBX version requirement: Firmware version 30.13.0.30 or later.
PBX version requirement: Firmware version 80.13.0.30 or later.
By default, API feature on PBX is disabled. Before using API feature, you need to enable API on and configure the relevant settings.
